mapper.select: SELECT R.REPORT_ID , R.REPORT_MEMBER , R.REPORT_TYPE_ID , R.RECEIVED_REPORT_MEMBER , R.REPORT_CONTENT_ID , TO_CHAR(R.REPORT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REPORT_DATE , R.REPORT_REASON , R.REPORT_REASON_CONTENT , R.ATTACHED_IMG , R.PROGRESS_YN , CC.CODE_ID REASON_ID , CC.CODE_CONTENT REASON , C.CODE_ID TYPE_ID , C.CODE_CONTENT TYPE FROM REPORT R LEFT JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON R.REPORT_REASON = CC.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON R.REPORT_TYPE_ID = C.CODE_ID ORDER BY R.REPORT_DATE DESC
